metadata.name: Use of VSIISExeLauncher.exe
metadata.comment: The "VSIISExeLauncher.exe" binary part of the Visual Studio/VS Code can be used to execute arbitrary binaries

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\vsiisexelauncher.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('vsiisexelauncher.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -a '))))

output.summary: The "VSIISExeLauncher.exe" binary part of the Visual Studio/VS Code can be used to execute arbitrary binaries
